Topic.Title: Can't Create New Quest Game (driving me crazy)

Posts.EditableText:
I click on 'Create New Quest Game'. Then I fill out the name of the game ect. Then I click 'create', and it responds with 'Sorry an error occurred whilst processing you request'

Please help me this is driving me crazy. I used to work, but now it doesn't.
Posts.HTML:
I click on 'Create New Quest Game'. Then I fill out the name of the game ect. Then I click 'create', and it responds with 'Sorry an error occurred whilst processing you request'

Please help me this is driving me crazy. I used to work, but now it doesn't.

Posts.EditableText: You are using the onlineeditor? Which game type and language do you choose?
Posts.HTML: You are using the onlineeditor? Which game type and language do you choose?

Posts.EditableText: Yep online editor. Game type: text adventure. Language: English.
Posts.HTML: Yep online editor. Game type: text adventure. Language: English.

Posts.EditableText: Have you made sure the page's address starts with `https://` rather than `http://`? That's the most common reason for  not being able to create a new game.
Posts.HTML: Have you made sure the page's address starts with https:// rather than http://? That's the most common reason for not being able to create a new game.

Posts.EditableText: You're a genuis mate. Thank you. Very Much
Posts.HTML: You're a genuis mate. Thank you. Very Much
